title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: In the ImageAnalyzer example, the scrollbars are currently enabled but do not have any effect when moved. This can be misleading, especially when opening a small image like an icon.
OB: Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only): Open the ImageAnalyzer example. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled and movable, but they don't have any effect.
EB: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example should be disabled, as they are currently misleading and do not provide any functionality.
SR:
1. Launch Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
2. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
3. Observe the enabled scrollbars.
4. Attempt to move the scrollbars and note that they do not have any effect.
